name: Stop the State Virus
description:
Stop the "state influenza" from taking over! Once citizens become infected, the zombie state is not far behind. Your goal is to stop the spread of the virus:

  1. Shoot masks onto uninfected citizens to protect them
  2. Shoot cure syringes into the infected citizens before they "turn"
  3. Shoot bullets to kill zombies before they infect more citizens

You are immune, with one very important tool, your heat-sensing visor. Use it to discover who is feverish and who is not, before they turn into cold-blooded killers.
